title: What is Notification History and how do you use it on your Android device?
content:
Do you ever get a little swipe-happy and end up deleting multiple notifications that may or may not have been important? How do you get it back? Fortunately, a little feature called Notification History exists on Android for Pixel, Samsung devices, and OnePlus phones and is meant for that exact scenario. Here’s how it works.

more…

The post What is Notification History and how do you use it on your Android device? appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Did you know you could revisit dismissed notifications? Notification History with Android works on your Pixel, Samsung, or OnePlus phone.
